<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Create Homework">90a8db152f910110ee00d5f62799b6b6</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Don't Submit if notes or attach miss</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
     var attachments = g_form.getElement('header_attachment_list_label');
   if ((attachments.style.visibility == 'hidden' || attachments.style.display == 'none') && !g_form.getValue('notes') ) {
       g_form.addErrorMessage('You must attach at least 1 file or add notes before submitting.');
       return false;
   }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>icristi</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-26 12:22:54</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b8ad9f592f910110ee00d5f62799b693</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Don't Submit if notes or attach miss</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="German Learning" source="x_723119_germanlrn">612b9ab72f100110ee00d5f62799b622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="German Learning">612b9ab72f100110ee00d5f62799b622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_b8ad9f592f910110ee00d5f62799b693</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>icristi</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-26 12:22:54</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
